entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
